content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. Are you looking to schedule electrical service with us today? May I have your name please?
Hi, this is Lisa. Yes, I need some electrical work done.
Hi Lisa, thank you! Could you please provide your address so I can check if you are in our service area?
Thanks, Lisa. You are within our service area. What time would be ideal for you to have our electrician visit?
I’m hoping for tomorrow afternoon, anytime after 2 PM.
Let me check our availability for tomorrow afternoon after 2 PM...
We have an opening tomorrow at 3 PM. Would you like me to book that for you?
Actually, I found a cheaper electrician online that can come tomorrow. So I’ll pass on booking with you. Thanks though.
reason: Customer found a cheaper competitor and declined to book
